projects.title: Rise Myanmar â€” Earthquake Relief Platform
projects.imageAlt: Screenshot of Rise Myanmar web platform showing interactive relief map with donation tracking and multilingual support
projects.description: Open-source platform to coordinate earthquake relief in Myanmar. Features include real-time needs tracking, interactive maps, news updates, and trusted donation campaigns with full English and Burmese language support.
projects.tags: Web Development, Open Source, React, Humanitarian

projects.title: Graphing Calculator (SFML)
projects.imageAlt: Interactive graphing calculator showing plotted mathematical functions with real-time rendering
projects.description: Feature-rich graphing calculator built using SFML tools in C++ for interactive mathematical function plotting. Supports multiple function types, zoom controls, and real-time graph rendering.

projects.title: Optimizing K-means Clustering using Transformer
projects.imageAlt: Research poster showing Transformer-based K-means optimization with performance charts and methodology diagrams
projects.description: Research project (UCSD ERSP) using Transformer models (TabPFN and looped attention mechanisms) to predict clustering centroids and reduce iteration counts compared to classical K-means variants.

projects.title: AI-Powered Code Review Assistant
projects.imageAlt: Screenshot of AI code review tool analyzing pull requests
projects.description: Intelligent code review assistant leveraging large language models to provide automated code quality analysis, security vulnerability detection, and best practice recommendations.

projects.title: Real-Time Chat Application
projects.imageAlt: Real-time chat interface with multiple rooms and user presence indicators
projects.description: Scalable real-time chat application built with WebSockets, Redis, and Node.js. Features include multi-room support, message persistence, typing indicators, and end-to-end encryption.
